Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Oak
ShortDescription: NB 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, Walton, State, Division, Clark, LaSalle & Stockton due to street blockage near Inner Lk Shr Drive/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Walton, State, Division, Clark, LaSalle and Stockton due to street blockage near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Oak.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ellis/54th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to street blockage near Ellis/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to street blockage near Ellis/54th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier police activty at Western (Forest Park Branch). Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier police activty at Western (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line trains are running with major delays near Armitage due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line trains are running with major delays near Armitage due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
